title: Veloxpack Profiles
description: Collection of reusable profile specifications for Veloxpack core workloads.

audioLayout.title: Audio Layout
audioLayout.description: Defines channel layout capabilities and codec targets.

encryptionProfile.title: Encryption Profile
encryptionProfile.description: Configures content protection policies and key management.

notificationProfile.title: Notification Profile
notificationProfile.description: Describes event routing for workflow notifications and alerts.

packagingProfile.title: Packaging Profile
packagingProfile.description: Controls manifest generation and packaging formats.

resourceProfile.title: Resource Profile
resourceProfile.description: Specifies compute resources for transcoding workloads.

scrubPreviewProfile.title: Scrub Preview Profile
scrubPreviewProfile.description: Generates lightweight preview assets for scrubbing interfaces.

thumbnailProfile.title: Thumbnail Profile
thumbnailProfile.description: Defines thumbnail extraction cadence and formatting.

transcodingProfile.title: Transcoding Profile
transcodingProfile.description: Outlines video/audio ladder and codec settings for renditions.

videoSplitProfile.title: Video Split Profile
videoSplitProfile.description: Configures automated chaptering and segment extraction.
